resources.string: Please enter the temporary code from your email below
Note: Be sure to let your Recorder know of any special requests you have (ex: show me the inside of the kitchen cabinets).
Do you want to end chat & mark this job as complete
FYI: This job falls outside your desired commute radius. You\'ll earn extra $$ for this one!
